delivery_method.description: K = Kurir, S = Šalter, PAK = Pаккетомат

expected_products.description: Number of products that would use this

create_category.description: If true, creates the category in c2c_categories

validation_ok.description: True if all preview rows are valid

display_value.description: Вспомогательное поле для вывода значения любого типа в строковом виде

public_url.description: Публичный URL для доступа к файлу

is_storefront_product.description: Флаг что это товар витрины (для правильной обработки в favorites)

metadata.description: Для хранения дополнительной информации, включая данные о скидке

attributes.description: JSON поле для хранения атрибутов варианта

id.description: Изменено на string для поддержки external IDs

provider.description: Связанные данные (не из БД, заполняются при необходимости)

supported_payment_methods.description: Поддерживаемые методы оплаты для этой доставки

delivery_provider.description: Provider code для delivery microservice (только для UI)

delivery_status.description: Tracking info from delivery service (NOT stored in DB, enriched from microservice)

address_translations.description: AddressTranslations - map[language]address, e.g. {"en": "Street 12, Novi Sad", "ru": "Улица 12, Нови-Сад"}

is_deleted.description: Флаг для placeholder пользователей (не сохраняется в БД)

settings.description: JSONB поле для расширяемых настроек (chat settings и др.)

city.description: Теперь используем обычные строки, а не указатели

is_deleted.description: Флаг для placeholder пользователей (не сохраняется в БД)

continue_selling.description: continue selling when out of stock

selected_attributes.description: which attributes are used for variants

categoryIDs.description: Массив ID категорий для множественного выбора

storefrontFilter.description: Фильтр для B2C объявлений: "include_b2c", "exclude_b2c", пустая строка = exclude_b2c по умолчанию

max_weight_change.description: Максимальное изменение веса за одну оптимизацию

data.description:
Base64-encoded encrypted JSON-serialized data with unique user's
payload, data hashes and secrets required for EncryptedPassportElement
decryption and authentication

hash.description: Base64-encoded data hash for data authentication

secret.description:
Base64-encoded secret, encrypted with the bot's public RSA key,
required for data decryption

data.description:
Base64-encoded encrypted Telegram Passport element data provided by
the user, available for "personal_details", "passport",
"driver_license", "identity_card", "identity_passport" and "address"
types. Can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying
EncryptedCredentials.

email.description: User's verified email address, available only for "email" type

files.description:
Array of encrypted files with documents provided by the user,
available for "utility_bill", "bank_statement", "rental_agreement",
"passport_registration" and "temporary_registration" types. Files can
be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

front_side.description:
Encrypted file with the front side of the document, provided by the
user. Available for "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card" and
"internal_passport". The file can be decrypted and verified using the
accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

phone_number.description: User's verified phone number, available only for "phone_number" type

reverse_side.description:
Encrypted file with the reverse side of the document, provided by the
user. Available for "driver_license" and "identity_card". The file can
be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

selfie.description:
Encrypted file with the selfie of the user holding a document,
provided by the user; available for "passport", "driver_license",
"identity_card" and "internal_passport". The file can be decrypted
and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

credentials.description: Encrypted credentials required to decrypt the data

data.description:
Array with information about documents and other Telegram Passport
elements that was shared with the bot

file_date.description: Unix time when the file was uploaded

affects_stock.description: NEW: determines if this attribute requires separate stock tracking
